dcterms:creator: I. Demir
Z. Xiang
B. Demiray
M. Sit
dcterms:description: WaterBench-Iowa is a benchmark dataset designed for data-driven streamflow forecasting, encompassing hydrological and meteorological data from 125 locations across Iowa, collected from reputable sources such as NASA, NOAA, USGS, and the Iowa Flood Center. The dataset spans from October 2011 to September 2018 and includes various key hydrological data, including streamflow measurements, precipitation records, watershed characteristics, slope, soil types, and evapotranspiration.
dcterms:title: WaterBench-Iowa
